    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              Colour colour)
        Deprecated. 
        This is a constructor method for the Player class that creates a new Player object. The method checks if there is already a player in the system with the same name. If there is, it retrieves that player's existing statistics and assigns them to the new player object. If not, the method initializes the new player with default statistics.
        Parameters:
        name - The user name of the player
        colour - The colour the player is playing as.

        Returns:
